column1: We all must work together to reduce plastic waste and protect our environment. I'm glad to see businesses and environmental groups partnering to invest in our recycling infrastructure in North Texas! https://t.co/epsutoiYGl

Voting should be easy and accessible to everyone eligible and the state should not be putting up barriers to online registration. Texans should be able to register to vote online when they update or renew their driver's licenses. https://t.co/OT3lvYi3br

Thank you @MiguelForDallas for a decade of service to DISD. In your time you helped our district become a model for the country and you helped countless kids chase their dreams.   As a DISD grad and the son of a DISD teacher thank you! https://t.co/LZDO7AwhHO

More and more the American dream is out of reach for too many. I am endorsing @JoeBiden for President because no candidate in this race has done more to fight so that every American can have access to their version of the American dream. https://t.co/f0P8syPGwW

Texans have a long history of welcoming those suffering from oppression and violence across the world. This is not who we are. We can follow and enforce our laws without sacrificing the values that make our state great. https://t.co/9GD8ZxS5u5

Now more than ever Congress must be a measured and steady voice on foreign policy. Our values and our safety are undermined when the President threatens war crimes and when we ignore our own constitutional system of checks and balances.   Read my op-ed: https://t.co/2uUJC2z3dZ
This is great news for the people of Kansas now let’s see if we can cover 1.2 million Texans by doing the same. https://t.co/Hfy6UrYgVv
May God bless and keep our troops in harm’s way safe tonight. https://t.co/FleMJBcWi2

Our Constitution grants Congress the authority to declare war. This week I’ll vote to reaffirm that power because for too long Congress allowed presidents to conduct war without congressional approval. We can’t let those mistakes lead us into another war. https://t.co/rRNUw3fCo1

.@JulianCastro ran a campaign that was about something bigger than himself and called all of us to remember the most vulnerable in our country.   He may be out of this race but I know he is not done leading. You made Texas proud my friend.   ¡Vamos!

This is a special moment for these student athletes and @BUfootball. Good luck tonight on the big stage at the @SugarBowlNola! All of your fellow @Baylor family alumni and students across the nation are rooting for you! #SicEm https://t.co/Oib95lqqHg

As we look forward to this new year I want to thank North Texans for entrusting me with the honor of a lifetime — to serve in Congress and represent the area where I was born and raised.   Aly and I wish all our friends and neighbors across North Texas a safe and happy 2020! https://t.co/cwnWovV0GV

Congressman John Lewis has fought for a better America his entire life. I have no doubt that he will fight cancer with the same determined and loving spirit. My prayers and the prayers of millions of Americans will be with him. https://t.co/pVjkqsweIq

No community should live in fear of an attack because of who they are and how they worship. Our prayers are with New Yorkers as they stand in the face of anti-Semitism. We must all unite to root out this type of hate wherever it exists. https://t.co/XBZ9k3It4p

At every level of government we must work together to combat the climate crisis and protect our planet for the next generation. I commend our great Texas cities for leading on this effort and thanks to @DallasMayor Johnson for making this a priority. https://t.co/g3tkzPHzZg

Hamilton Park was a refuge for black families who were prevented by discrimination from owning or buying homes in Dallas. Pioneers like Ms. Washington remind us of the wrongs of our past as she inspires us to work towards a better future. Read her story. https://t.co/xI4WFguCKp
From our family to yours Merry Christmas! 🎄 https://t.co/hnSTtuKE9I
Great news for Garland! Manufacturers and food producers like Kraft help drive our economy and this investment will create 250 new jobs in our North Texas community! https://t.co/0wdmcHf27I
Aly and I are wishing all our friends and neighbors a #HappyHanukkah!  Chag Sameach on this first night of the Festival of Lights!

If the ACA is repealed the TX uninsured rate would jump by 37% leaving 6.4 million uninsured. With troubling news about the ACA lawsuit this week know I'm committed to defending your health care and protections for folks w/ pre-existing conditions. https://t.co/TAetMWtVfm

This is a top priority for me and for Texas. I'm proud that after months of work the House is poised to take a huge step forward and support tens of thousands of North Texas jobs with the passage of the new trade agreement between US Mexico and Canada. https://t.co/WV3z8WhADG

Texans think big and I'm proud to be leading the bipartisan effort to support this project that will be a win for businesses travelers & our environment. It'll reduce congestion by removing 14k cars from I-45 + get folks between DFW & Houston in 90 mins. https://t.co/8kWlnFGF4d

I’m always working to find common ground and deliver results for North Texans. I was glad to join @NBCDFW to discuss my bipartisan work on things like the USMCA which will secure thousands of jobs in our region. https://t.co/LRKvnPHO90

Folks across North Texas are getting crushed by the high price of prescription drugs which is why I've been fighting to pass this sweeping bill since I came to Congress. I am glad the House took action last week and I will keep working to lower prices. https://t.co/fIltQLrDjG

I am committed to working across the aisle to get things done. I was glad to join a bipartisan panel on parental leave at the White House this week to push for solutions like my bill that will help new parents get access to much-needed financial help. https://t.co/ttbGGqZHUX
Congratulations to Tom Joyner who had a phenomenal career based in Dallas. I had the privilege of visiting the Dallas studios last year. Your voice will be missed by millions! https://t.co/auWp7ipqro

I do not take this decision lightly but it is clear the President engaged in a serious abuse of power and committed an impeachable offense. As a member of the House I must uphold the rule of law and defend the Constitution. https://t.co/R9RJikMV4x

Texas is the #1 trade state in the nation and trade w/ Mexico & Canada supports tens of thousands of jobs across our region. I’m proud to have helped lead the effort to reach an agreement that will help our economy the environment & protect American jobs. https://t.co/7rpd8PscvC

Congrats to @PanthersHHS on the new gym classrooms and improvements throughout the campus. As a Hillcrest alum I'm glad to see the completion of this investment in Hillcrest and other schools throughout our area. https://t.co/E959wyJyte
Let's go Bears! Good luck to all the @BUFootball players and coaches out there today at the #Big12Championship in North Texas. #SicEm 🐻 https://t.co/szF6nIooGz

I know from welcoming our son earlier this year there are so many costs that parents face when a new child arrives. That's why I'm proud to be leading this bipartisan bill that will get new parents access to financial help to offset these costs. https://t.co/jdZWpokvoZ

I am a @ymca kid and I am where I am today in large part due to non-profit orgs like the Y. Today is #GivingTuesdayDFW so please consider pitching in a few dollars to help a cause important to you and our non-profit community throughout North Texas. https://t.co/lhrN4xMSqy

Our troops are often away from their families on holidays and it's critical we show them how much support they have back home. That's why I was honored to travel with the Veterans Committee overseas for Thanksgiving and show my appreciation in person. https://t.co/UbotVDG43R
From farmers markets to bookstores to cafes  -- small businesses help our economy thrive -- so make sure to #shoplocal this #SmallBizSaturday throughout North Texas! https://t.co/zRLk9xZwAX
Aly and I wish a #HappyThanksgiving to our neighbors family and friends across North Texas. We are so grateful for our many blessings and we hope this holiday brings you peace fellowship and joy!

So proud of our North Texas community for coming together to help hundreds of our neighbors have a good Thanksgiving.   Thank you to all North Texans who volunteered their time this week to help families in need. https://t.co/uyKBC4XxeR

This is a good step toward strengthening our federal animal cruelty laws to prevent animal abuse. I was proud to co-sponsor and vote for this bill in honor of our sweet Ridgeback Scarlet who we lost earlier this year to cancer. https://t.co/cjATNEOIZq

It's so inspiring to see these students gain confidence self-esteem and skills by building rocking horses at the Multiple Careers Magnet Center. Thanks to teacher Terry Stotts and everyone @dallasschools who helps make this program successful. https://t.co/7YhnnG8eNx

I agree with @NTxCommission CEO Chris Wallace.   Texas needs #Dreamers.  More than 92000 Dreamers lived and worked in North Texas in 2017. Many own businesses and create jobs earning $1 billion and paying $199 million in local state and federal taxes. https://t.co/8ZOSmQ6X5r

Post 9/11 vets are more likely to have served in a combat zone and 36% say they experience post-traumatic stress. We must ensure our vets get the help they need and I commend this North Texas clinic that's helping our vets with mental health services. https://t.co/NRdS9OPrgD

Today we remember those we’ve tragically lost to acts of intolerance and hate and this Transgender Day of Remembrance let’s all commit to a world free from violence and bigotry against all our neighbors in the transgender community. #TDOR https://t.co/uNsh240Bw0

A powerful statement today from Lt. Col. Vindman as he thanks his dad for taking a chance and immigrating from the Soviet Union to the U.S. in search of a better life.  "Do not worry I will be fine for telling the truth." https://t.co/QJsKTxkhAu

It's truly an honor to serve on the Veterans' Affairs Committee and work on behalf of vets. As members of Congress we have a duty-bound oath to our veterans. Let's use that commitment to forge bipartisan relationships and work together for all Americans. https://t.co/MykLyT5AWX

My heart breaks with news of the tragic loss of life after a shooting at a school in Santa Clarita.   I refuse to accept this as the new normal. The Senate must act and join the House on common-sense gun safety. Our children must be safe in our schools. https://t.co/AzOnBL831C

Our community is made stronger by #Dreamers. In D/FW we have the third most #DACA recipients of any metro area and business groups and experts agree -- these young folks are contributing to our region's success as students workers and public servants. https://t.co/rxAvVdtwbv

This #VeteransDay is a chance to honor the sacrifices that our men and women in uniform have made to serve our great country. It’s also a reminder that working together to keep our commitments to our veterans is the best way that we as a nation can thank them for their service. https://t.co/2ECRn2kWJc

I'm working across the aisle to lower the high cost of insulin for North Texans because in the richest most powerful nation on Earth no one should ration their insulin in order to survive. https://t.co/bC7WFEOMQl

It has been one year since we made history North Texas! I'm honored to represent #TX32 where I was born and raised.  In Congress I'll always fight for North Texas values and work to lower health care costs and ensure everyone has a shot at their version of the American dream. https://t.co/NYoyc5elHo

Aly and I are praying for the mother and baby hurt in this terrible attack at a CVS in University Park this weekend.   If you have any information about the suspect please contact the police at (214) 564-4148. https://t.co/rIcgHmTddQ

We just voted in today’s elections! Polls are open until 7 PM so be sure to vote and make your voice heard North Texas.   Look up your polling place and get voting information here: https://t.co/lCN6pBkIqY https://t.co/6G6zC5eb5E
You can learn more about the state constitutional amendments that are on the ballot in today's election here: https://t.co/XNC14OohI9 #ElectionDay2019

Today is #ElectionDay! It’s important that North Texans make their voices heard and vote today. Polls are open from 7 AM - 7 PM. There are even new county wide polling locations which make it easier to cast your ballot.   Get info on today’s election: https://t.co/QUEruy6zhI

Aly and I had a great time last night at the Black Tie Dinner supporting North Texas #lgbtq organizations and hearing from the incomparable @theebillyporter! It’s more important now than ever that we come together to support equality. #TX32 https://t.co/Ony9MSBuO6
.@BetoORourke is all heart. We need more people like him in our public discourse people who say what they mean and mean what they say.   Thank you Beto Amy and your family for doing Texas proud.

Hey North Texans today is the first day of open enrollment. If you or someone in your family needs health insurance you can shop for 2020 plans at https://t.co/XJ6E6uWbcn.   You have until December 15 to #GetCovered!

When you see efforts to undermine the ACA from this Administration or hear about Texas refusing to expand Medicaid know that it is children who will suffer.   We must do better. https://t.co/DfEwns5Nto
Jordan Aly and I are wishing everyone in #TX32 a safe and happy Halloween! https://t.co/dqw2zGArN4

Today is the last day of #BreastCancerAwarenessMonth. As the son of a breast cancer survivor this fight is personal. That’s why I’m proud to lead the effort to ensure women have access to the diagnostic tests they need. Learn about that bipartisan effort: https://t.co/Qnr2bH0H5V

On the Transportation Committee my job is to ensure air travel is safe.   Today I told Boeing's CEO there needs to be accountability for the terrible process that failed the American people resulting in tragedy and huge financial loss with the 737 Max. https://t.co/mrpMCHLP4I

Our nation owes a debt of gratitude to our brave special forces our Intelligence Community our allies and everyone who made this successful operation to take down this dangerous ISIS leader happen. https://t.co/vqsT5xbCDp
Aly and I wish a happy and peaceful #Diwali to North Texans and those around the world celebrating the Festival of Lights!

Our hearts break with news of a mass shooting near Greenville and Aly and I send our deepest condolences to the victims and their families.  I urge the Senate to act and work with the House to pass common sense gun safety measures that will save lives. https://t.co/MJ9Tn4Xr5g

Glad to see @mcuban’s generous gift to support our students and teachers as North Texans come together to help our community recover.   Learn more about how you can pitch in if you can here: https://t.co/q92BkcRLlv https://t.co/vu4201qsgR

In 2018 foreign agents tried to influence our elections in North Texas. They had an agenda that wasn’t an American agenda or a North Texas agenda.   Today I fought for a bill to secure our elections b/c we must work together to protect American democracy. https://t.co/u22piewY3j
I want to thank both @AdamMcGoughD10 for organizing and @cmjsgates for stopping by and all you are doing for this community.

North Texas is a place that takes care of our neighbors and I saw that everywhere I went today.   Despite the heartbreaking damage this community has come together to help one another as the recovery process begins after this storm. https://t.co/EoAJz9lMfC
Aly and I are praying for our neighbors in North Texas after tonight’s storms and are thankful for the emergency responders on the scene.

Chairman Cummings was a great man who fought tirelessly for his constituents with integrity. Congress and our nation has lost a leader.  Aly and I send our deepest condolences to the Cummings family. https://t.co/qInrOFo7V7

Too many North Texans are hurting b/c of the high cost of prescription drugs. That's why I'm fighting to pass into law HR 3 a bill that uses powerful tools to lower costs for North Texans.   Let's work together to get something done to #LowerDrugCosts. https://t.co/egs6mUMTmy

This community is my home and I wouldn't be where I am today without the support I got from Hillcrest High School.   Yesterday I was so glad to join friends neighbors and fellow alumni as the Grand Marshall at the Hillcrest homecoming parade. Good luck at the game tonight! https://t.co/YWpumjsbBS

This is a shameful betrayal of our allies the Kurds who fought bravely against ISIS.   People who trusted the United States will die because of this impulsive reckless decision and I fear our credibility may never recover. https://t.co/ek8HIA3qkx
On #YomKippur Aly and I are wishing everyone observing a peaceful and meaningful fast. G'mar Chatima Tova.

Everyone deserves equal protection under the law and no one should be fired for who they love or who they are.   I'm so inspired by the bravery and perseverance of William and his late partner Donald on behalf of equality for #LGBTQ Americans and us all. https://t.co/vqIs3F88gk

Our hearts go out to the family of Joshua Brown who was taken from us in yet another act of senseless gun violence. I am confident that his murder will be investigated with integrity and pray that the murderer will be brought to justice swiftly. https://t.co/cTmmnWKqwD

It was great to speak with students at my alma mater @PanthersHHS about the importance of service and hard work. I'm a product of our public school system and I'm proof that students here in North Texas can all achieve their version of the American Dream. https://t.co/BinJYfqXdj

I'm fighting to lower costs and fix our health care system so everyone can get the care they need. It's so important we eliminate disparities in health care access in our great city and end the medical debt crisis affecting communities across North Texas. https://t.co/kL3EI2AsTK

The American people are counting on us to proceed with this inquiry in a judicious thoughtful manner and we must approach this with the seriousness it deserves. History is watching.   Listen to my discussion with @amyewalter on NPR's @TheTakeaway: https://t.co/6sSgKzrNBQ
Aly and I wish all who are celebrating a joyous and happy new year. Chag sameach and Shana Tova North Texas! #RoshHashanah https://t.co/k3UayURzTl

Great news for North Texas!   As a member of the Transportation Committee I was glad to support @AmericanAir's expansion to Tokyo Haneda. It will help connect North Texans to more of the world and solidify @DFWAirport as a global travel hub. https://t.co/Q9JhlgCpn7

I have a duty bound by oath to defend the Constitution and uphold the laws of the United States and our laws are clear. The Director of National Intelligence must provide the whistleblower complaint to Congress. https://t.co/DIuabKB0Dj

My deepest condolences are with the victim of this heinous act of hate. No North Texan should live in fear of violence just because of who they are.  I hope the perpetrator is brought to justice. We have much work to do to spread tolerance and combat hate. https://t.co/8aMlKRAE1f

I commend the orgs helping students save for college. Together we have much work to do. I'm fighting to make sure higher education and obtaining the job skills to live your version of the American Dream is affordable and accessible to every North Texan.  https://t.co/rhhhTHp4DL

Congratulations to @NTxGivingDay and everyone who made the drive such a huge success!   The $50 million this community raised will benefit nearly 3000 nonprofits across North Texas and impact the lives of thousands of our neighbors. This is the North Texas I know. https://t.co/vfaM23GWcy

Today is #NorthTexasGivingDay! As a product of the YMCA I know how important local nonprofits are to the success of our region. North Texas is at its best when we work together and all pitch in to make our community a better place so get involved today. https://t.co/9M3ii9G8eF https://t.co/dRXsM3Sr9p

As the @dhhrm_org reopens in a new home with an expanded mission our North Texas community is more committed than ever to combatting antisemitism and hate in all its forms.   Thanks to everyone in North Texas who worked hard to make this a reality. https://t.co/8XmtrqqAFM

The Trump Administration's assault on the Affordable Care Act is nothing more than cynical partisan sabotage and it's hurting real people. Folks are facing higher bills than ever before.  We must #ProtectOurCare and work together to lower costs. https://t.co/iaPrsmJ1wt
You can read more about our story and why we need paid parental leave here:  https://t.co/cdx1Otth90

Thank you @KatyTurNBC for sharing your story & making a passionate case for paid parental leave so new parents can spend time with their babies. The weeks I spent with my son when he was born earlier this year were so important for me my wife & our baby. https://t.co/aNfF2ETtVe

Step aside Houston! So proud Dallas is earning national recognition for our great restaurants.   Our region's strength is our diversity and we showcase that through our delicious food and the talented and hardworking people who make it all happen. #TX32 https://t.co/yAqNRHaaI7

To achieve real lasting change that will make our communities safer we must all work together. I applaud the effort from businesses across industries both big and small who are urging the Senate to act now to help reduce gun violence. https://t.co/HHgJ7nxDqP

As a product of the YMCA and a beneficiary of T. Boone Pickens’s generosity and commitment to the Y I want to extend my sympathies to the entire Pickens family.   North Texas has lost a giant. https://t.co/ndKqgnVz6P

Texas has one of the lowest voter turnout rates in the nation and we must make voting more accessible for everyone. Was glad to join my colleague @JoeNeguse along with voting rights experts at #cbcalc2019 to discuss how we can make sure everyone can participate in our democracy. https://t.co/kFsnvexT8y

Today we come together to remember the horrific attacks and honor the thousands of innocent lives lost. We also remember how in our darkest hour we were more united than ever - living up to the fundamental American ideals that were the real target of those attacks. #NeverForget

I recently held a roundtable in Garland where I heard from North Texans about health care and their message was clear; instead of sabotaging the ACA and with it protections for folks w/ pre-existing conditions work together to fix our system. https://t.co/Lp9wTt4nq7

When we work together to find common ground we can do great things for North Texas.   Was glad to join my colleague Rep. Van Taylor on @NBCDFW to talk about bipartisanship infrastructure and working to build a new VA health facility in Garland. https://t.co/xl6BG76Wb9

The Federal Election Commission is broken and as bad actors at home and abroad seek to undermine our elections we need a cop on the beat to police election violations ahead of 2020. I’ll be working with my colleagues to fix this. https://t.co/B5iFbIng8E

Between 2006-2012 there was so much hydrocodone/oxycodone that every Dallas County resident could have 28 pills a year. Every $ spent on addressing the opioid crisis at Parkland is borne by county tax dollars.   Those responsible must be held accountable. https://t.co/BGGpglL1BM

The Trump Administration’s move to divert critical defense funds to seize Texans' land and build a wasteful ineffective wall is unconstitutional and dangerous.   Our troops and the American people deserve better. https://t.co/O1wtNy1vYw

Happy Labor Day! As many take the day to spend time with family and friends let us show thanks and gratitude to all the hardworking people who built this country and all the folks who power our North Texas community. #HappyLaborDay

Deeply saddened to see yet another tragic act of gun violence here in Texas. Aly & I send our condolences to our fellow Texans in Midland and Odessa.  The House took steps on commonsense gun safety measures and I urge the Senate to follow suit w/out delay. https://t.co/nNLFztF92T

These tariffs are hurting the Texas economy to the tune of $3.4 billion. We’ve got to end this trade war before local businesses lay off workers lose customers and lose their market share. https://t.co/0UWCundQ3X

We should be doing all we can to work w/ the energy industry to reduce greenhouse gases not removing protections they agree with. From vehicle emissions to mercury this Admin’s attack on the environment is harmful and even opposed by industries involved. https://t.co/DOrAW15xAU

This is not who we are. It’s our duty to keep our promises to our military families who have sacrificed so much for our nation. This Administration should not be putting up barriers for the children of service members born overseas to become citizens. https://t.co/SjImqyjuQJ

Our veterans have sacrificed so much and we must ensure they receive the care and services they are owed. That’s why I’m leading a bipartisan group of North Texans to urge action on a new VA clinic in Garland.  Read more via @dallasnews’ editorial: https://t.co/pO37SNVAhR #TX32

No matter who you are or who you love everyone deserves equal rights and equal protection under the law.   This is fundamental and something that I will fight for every day in Congress. I’m honored to receive the support of @HRC. https://t.co/TrxUZSC8IW #TX32

My job is to always do what’s best for North Texas and to work together to get things done for the folks here in this community. Was glad to chat with @pcpeople about my work so far this year on behalf of #TX32. https://t.co/0WgGpQiLRc
This is great news for our region and will bring an estimated 3000 jobs to Dallas!   Welcome to North Texas @Uber! https://t.co/G9SWkTJP3y

Title X has a history of bipartisan support and was championed by a Texan George H.W. Bush. Millions rely on @PPFA for health care and family planning in rural/underserved areas.   This Admin's actions will result in many not getting the care they need. https://t.co/KVN4VFswla
In Congress I’m proud to be leading the fight for equality. Thank you to @HRC for making me your first Congressional endorsement in Texas! We’ve got more work to do. #TX32 https://t.co/bYewXFF7ZB

Preventing members of Congress from visiting Israel to learn about our shared values and express their opinions is completely wrong and counter to the values of both of our great nations. I strongly urge Prime Minister Netanyahu to reconsider this decision.
This is heartbreaking news for the entire DISD family and our city. Please join Aly and I in praying for the Johnson family.    https://t.co/XYg8TuyvBa

My heart is with the injured police officers and the entire Philadelphia community tonight. I will continue to keep the officers in my thoughts and pray for their recovery.   It’s past time we did more to reduce gun violence in all its forms.
Mr. Jenkins’s kind spirit and act of generosity inspired our entire community and the country. Happy to see this community showing him such generosity in return.  https://t.co/LJFGXP6ZK1

In Congress I’m focused on fighting for our veterans health care Medicare and Social Security and infrastructure. Thank you to everyone who came out to the town hall last night. I’m honored to represent y’all. #TX32  https://t.co/64uHLIrpJc

What a heartwarming story of folks in Dallas witnessing this moment and honoring this family who served and sacrificed.  Dallas has always been home and I'm so proud of North Texans and our commitment to coming together in support of our neighbors. https://t.co/WSme5uAcB5

I applaud the North Texans at Cafe Momentum and the many people that dedicate their time working through the arts and teaching culinary skills to help kids who are most at risk.   Thanks @pbsnewshour for sharing their inspiring story. https://t.co/RJXsxKgg3k

Toni Morrison was an inspiration and made history as the first black woman to win the Nobel literature prize. Her passing is a loss to our nation and to anyone whose spirit was moved by her work. There's no doubt her legacy will live on for generations. https://t.co/F3svbIReim

So proud of this community for coming together to help our neighbors especially veterans who need affordable housing. I was thrilled to help out last week and join the folks at Habitat for Humanity in Garland as people volunteered their time to help families in need. #TX32 https://t.co/D9kl87sqrc

Ensuring we move forward on a VA clinic in Garland means we'll have to keep working together in a bipartisan way. I’m proud to be leading with my fellow North Texans to ensure our veterans get the care they need. https://t.co/rF1UcorCep

We went to sleep mourning El Paso and wake to news of another mass shooting in Dayton.  We passed common sense gun safety legislation in the House to make our communities safer. I again call on the Senate to make it law — urgently.

Gun violence is a public health criss and it is long past time we took action to prevent these tragedies. In the House we have passed common sense gun control measures. I was proud to vote for & consponsor them. I urge my colleagues in the Senate to do their job & make them law. https://t.co/BdXob1Agn8

Aly and I are deeply saddened by the news of a shooting in El Paso and we thank the El Paso Police and all the first responders for their diligence.   North Texans stand with our El Paso family and friends today in the wake of this tragic and senseless act of violence.

Too often the focus is on where we disagree but I was proud to join my Republican colleague Rep. Anthony Gonzalez and visit his district in Ohio. I hope we set an example of bipartisanship b/c working together is key to getting things done.  Excited to welcome him to #TX32 soon! https://t.co/Ya3BxjFD19

This is a tragedy. Dallas is my home and I know many at DPD and their commitment to public safety. These officers failed their colleagues and the public trust. Ensuring there is accountability and transparency is the only way we can move forward together. https://t.co/FTUnifhOzJ

Texas is leading the way on clean energy with wind power now serving 22% of our electricity needs.   Texas can and should continue to be a global leader on green-energy innovation and the jobs that go along with it. https://t.co/J27831tBGb

Heartbroken to hear that my North Texas colleague Rep. Ron Wright is battling lung cancer. Your optimism and dedication to public service is inspiring.   Aly and I are praying for you and for continued progress in beating this disease. https://t.co/H6RBip8Za5

As our veteran population grows we must work together to ensure they have access to the care they need. Working for our veterans is not partisan that's why I'm leading a bipartisan group of North Texas reps urging action on a new VA clinic in Garland. https://t.co/wkxQg77jos

Playing on a team teaches you that working together toward a common goal is key to success. The same goes for working in Congress and setting an example of bipartisanship. That's why I'm joining Rep. Gonzalez in Ohio next week & hosting him in #TX32 soon. https://t.co/x9kPB9TaXZ

No student should be burdened by debt for seeking an education.   Whether it's investing in community colleges and job training programs or making college more accessible we must ensure everyone can get the education they need to be successful. https://t.co/Q9AeVtuQZv

As North Texas grows we must work together to ensure folks can get the skills training and educational opportunities they need to get a good job and succeed. I'm committed to working with local and federal partners to invest in job training programs. https://t.co/J1eYuJkE80

On a playground today a child will be told to "go back" to their country because of something the President of the United States said.   Our leaders should unite us to create a more perfect union. Americans deserve better and this divisive rhetoric has no place in our politics.
